description.value:
While holding this simple bone stylus, your authority cannot be denied.

Wondrous Item: Rare

Property:

You gain a +3 item bonus to skill checks made as part of a binding ritual, and the ritual's casting time is halved.

Level 29: +5 item bonus. Once per day, you can also use a binding ritual without expending components.

Power - Daily (No Action)

Effect: Until the end of the encounter, once per round as a standard action, you can use the following attack power. On a miss, the effect ends.

Attack: Ranged 5 (one creature); the item's level +3 vs. Will

Hit: The target is dominated until the end of your next turn.
